snippet: Former President Francisco Flores is to stand trial on accusations that he diverted $15 million in donations for earthquake victims to his personal and political party accounts.
abstract: Judge in El Salvador orders former Pres Francisco Flores to stand trial for allegedly skimming $15 million from earthquake aid funds donated by Taiwan; Flores has been under house arrest since 2014 for embezzlement and other charges.
lead_paragraph: Former President Francisco Flores is to stand trial on accusations that he diverted $15 million in donations for earthquake victims to his personal and political party accounts.

headline.main: El Salvador: Ex-President Faces Corruption Trial
headline.print_headline: The Americas; El Salvador: Ex-President Faces Corruption Trial
